title: Trita Parsi: How US Foreign Policy Makes Everyone, Including the US, Less Safe
itunes:title: Trita Parsi: How US Foreign Policy Makes Everyone, Including the US, Less Safe
description: Quincy Institute Vice President Trita Parsi talks about the incredible amount of destruction that US foreign policy has wrought in Iran and in many other places, and how it has actually made the US less safe and less able to address the challenges ahead
content:encoded: Quincy Institute Vice President Trita Parsi talks about the incredible amount of destruction that US foreign policy has wrought in Iran and in many other places, and how it has actually made the US less safe and less able to address the challenges ahead
